page.title: 20SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: A quarterly magazine called the Moulton and District News Round covers our area. This invaluable publication which runs to 72 pages includes coming events reports on past events and meetings,and advertisments and articles on local history and geography. Publication began in 1973 but sadly ceased in 1984. Local organizations include scouts, cubs, brownies and W.I. in Moulton, while in Kentford there are W.I. and Rosemary Club and in Gazeley the Forget-me-not Club. Recent events have included a theatre group, barn dance and supper evening in Kentford, Gospel evening and school fete in Moulton and a social evening and a first aid course in Gazeley. A branch of the British Legion covers the area and other actvities include playgroups, football, darts and badminton clubs.
